body: While Eastern cultures have weapons equivalent to the longsword and the longbow, they often called them by different names. The following are statistical equivalents to just a few Eastern weapons with which you may be familiar.
name: Eastern Weapon Equivalents
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Weapons/Eastern Weapon Equivalents

sections.body: This long curved bow made of laminated bamboo or wood, and favored by many samurai, is equivalent to a longbow.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Weapons/Eastern Weapon Equivalents/Daikyu
sections.name: Daikyu

sections.body: This shorter bow is similar to the diakyu in form and construction and is equivalent to a shortbow.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Weapons/Eastern Weapon Equivalents/Hankyu
sections.name: Hankyu

sections.body: This heavy sword consists of large straight blade with a thick back and wickedly sharpened edge. It is equivalent to a longsword.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Weapons/Eastern Weapon Equivalents/Hwandudaedo
sections.name: Hwandudaedo
